statements: UPDATE quiz_questions SET correct_answer='New correct answer' WHERE question_id=1;
UPDATE quiz_questions SET incorrect_answer3='New incorrect answer' WHERE question_id=2;

UPDATE quiz_questions SET question_text = 'What is the capital of France?', correct_answer = 'Paris', incorrect_answer1 = 'Madrid', incorrect_answer2 = 'Berlin', incorrect_answer3 = 'Rome' WHERE question_id = 1

UPDATE quiz_questions SET incorrect_answer3 = 'Lisbon', correct_answer = 'Sydney', question_text = 'Which city is known as the Harbor City?', incorrect_answer1 = 'London', incorrect_answer2 = 'New York' WHERE question_id = 2
UPDATE quiz_questions SET correct_answer = '2' WHERE question_id = 1;
UPDATE student_responses SET is_correct = TRUE WHERE response_id = 5;
UPDATE quiz_questions SET correct_answer = 'Option A' WHERE question_id = 1;
UPDATE student_responses SET is_correct = true, chosen_answer = 'Option B' WHERE question_id = 2 AND student_id = 101;
UPDATE Quiz SET quiz_name = 'SQL Basics' WHERE quiz_id = 1;
UPDATE Question SET question_text = 'What is SQL?' WHERE question_id = 1;
UPDATE Quiz SET quiz_name = 'New Quiz Name' WHERE quiz_id = 1;
UPDATE Answer SET is_correct = TRUE WHERE question_id IN (SELECT question_id FROM Question WHERE quiz_id = 2);
UPDATE students SET age = 20 WHERE student_id = 1;
UPDATE quizzes SET total_marks = 50, quiz_name = 'Updated Quiz' WHERE quiz_id = 3;
UPDATE students SET age = 20 WHERE student_id = 1;
UPDATE quiz_attempts SET score = 95 WHERE attempt_id = 3;
UPDATE Students SET email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE student_id = 1;
UPDATE Courses SET instructor = 'Dr. Smith', credit_hours = 4 WHERE course_id = 3;
UPDATE Students SET email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE student_id=1;
UPDATE Courses SET instructor='Dr. Smith', credit_hours=4 WHERE course_id=101;
